meanings.definition: A type of drum beat typically used in hip hop and electronic music.
meanings.sent1: The DJ played some catchy breakbeats at the party.
meanings.sent2: I love dancing to the energetic breakbeats in this song.
meanings.sent3: The breakbeats in that track got everyone on the dance floor!
meanings.sent4: Her music was like a storm of breakbeats, powerful and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The breakbeats echoed through the room, setting the perfect rhythm.

meanings.definition: The rhythmic pattern created by a series of broken or chopped up drum beats.
meanings.sent1: The breakbeats in this mix are so unique and cool.
meanings.sent2: He added some breakbeats to the song to give it a modern twist.
meanings.sent3: The breakbeats in that track sound like a puzzle of rhythms.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves followed the breakbeats like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The breakbeats in the music were like a heartbeat, pulsing with energy.
